Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Harrison/Damen
ShortDescription: Westbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Ogden, Van Buren, Damen, and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Harrison/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Ogden, Van Buren, Damen, and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Harrison/Damen.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Westbound Reroute near Armitage/Dayton
ShortDescription: Westbound 73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Halsted, Webster, Sheffield and Armitage, due to street blockage near Armitage/Dayton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Halsted, Webster, Sheffield and Armitage, due to street blockage near Armitage/Dayton.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Kedzie
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to a sick customer. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
